GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of articles filtered by a query. If the query is omitted, serves an array of all articles, which can be sorted by certain queries in ascending and descending order. If a limit query is provided, serves an array of x-amount of articles, where x is equal to the limit. If a p (page) query is provided, serves an array starting from the page number provided. If neither limit nor p queries are provided, limit defaults to 20, and p to 0

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a specific user object when a username is provided

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article as an object

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for a given article. If a limit query is provided, serves an array of x-amount of articles, where x is equal to the limit. If a p (page) query is provided, serves an array starting from the page number provided. If neither limit nor p queries are provided, limit defaults to 15, and p to 0

GET /api/search.description: serves an array of objects based on search query(ies) provided

POST /api/articles.description: posts a new article. Author and topic must already exist int he database

exampleRequest.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleRequest.author: butter_bridge

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to a specific article when an article_id is provided

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the votes on a given comment when a comment_id is provided

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes property on a given article when an article_id is provided

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the specified comment when a comment_id is provided

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id.description: deletes the specified article when an article_id is provided
